scripts.build: del-cli dist && rollup -c && tsc -d --emitDeclarationOnly --resolveJsonModule --declarationDir dist --lib DOM src/index.ts && mv dist/src/ dist/types
scripts.generate-test-images: tsc --esModuleInterop --outDir tmp src/__tests__/util/generateTestImagesScript.ts && node tmp/__tests__/util/generateTestImagesScript.js; del-cli tmp; npm run format
scripts.compile-demo: tsc --outDir tmp demo/main.ts && cp tmp/main.js demo/ && del-cli tmp
